website_summaries.verdict: While this affordable book has mixed reviews on its effectiveness, thanks to the author's success guarantee, it's worth considering to add to your test studying materials.
pros: An expert in studying and preparing for test taking, the author guarantees a score of 80% or higher or your money back
Contains tips for improving your overall score
cons: Some users wish it had more sample tests
Not ideal for test takers in all states

customer_reviews.title: I can’t swear it was the book that helped him pass, but..it was the book.
customer_reviews.text: My son missed the written test for the Sheriff’s Dept. 3 times (he didn’t study anything). We bought him this book, he studied, and passed the very next go around. Amazing how that happens. We’re proud to say we now have a kid about to start the academy. The very best of luck to everyone using this and testing.
customer_reviews.author: ReadingIsMyHustle

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Material
customer_reviews.text: After using this booklet I am noticing there is grammatical errors in the teaching lessons. In addition to the grammatical errors, I'm also noticing there is numerical errors when referencing diagrams in association to sample questions and page numbers. The material covered in this book is quite impressive. However, these small details distract the learning. I would not recommend buying this book as some of the questions and the answers are completely contradictory. I give this a two star simply for the material provided.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: No help for Texas
customer_reviews.text: ZEROOOOO Help for Texas exams, Texas has a general knowledge test. This is no help for the entrance exam.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy for a Successful Exam!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best decision I made to prep for the written exam. Everything you need to know and more, is in this book. I spent a couple hours a day going through each chapter leading up to exam day. Everything is super easy to follow, the practice tests are great. Used it for about 2 weeks prior to exam and I scored a 98%. Definitely worth the money and time
customer_reviews.author: Ashley P.

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for me
customer_reviews.text: This book was recommended by the recruiting Officer from the department I applied to. The book itself only covered about 45% of the actual exam, but I think it depends on your academy's curriculum. I would say that the practice questions in this book were a lot harder than what was on the real exam, so if you study this well, your real exam will be cake. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: 0311Keyser

customer_reviews.title: Must buy and study
customer_reviews.text: Patrol LEO. I bought this book back when I took my entrance exam. I got an 89% on my test. I suggest this book to anyone who is facing a written police entrence exam because it is very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Great study material
customer_reviews.text: Tested with 3 different departments and passed all 3. This book help me understand what types of questions are on a test.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Practiced 2 hours every other day passed my exam with an 83% and noticed I did not fill in/answer 3 question at the end.
customer_reviews.author: Valeria Ochoa

customer_reviews.title: Ordered this book for a friend to take police exams ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this book for a friend to take police exams, he did very well and said this book was extremely helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Workbook!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this book for preparing for the written test. It is very informative and gave great scenarios! I passed my written test and I have an interview with the police department this week! I paired this workbook with the Kaplan 2020 Police Exam book and the Police exam flashcards by Barron!
customer_reviews.author: Austin Ullery

customer_reviews.title: Good insights to cop mindset
customer_reviews.text: I have been a cop for a long time. I tell new people this book is a great investment. It gives you the reasons behind the decisions we make and why some answers are better than others. Get it. You Will do better on the test.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I got this book to help practice math and there ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this book to help practice math and there is hardly any math inside the book. In the practice tests they only have maybe 5 math questions very similar to each other. I wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Not even close to what really happens during a process
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Kelsay

customer_reviews.title: Best book ever!
customer_reviews.text: This book I can’t even praise it enough. Best study guide for someone looking into and getting ready to test for the police entrance exam!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great book .
customer_reviews.text: I just received my package today and it was packaged very well. I have just skimmed the book and it already seems like it will help me with my exam. I did pretty well on my first try, but barely failed, so I am hoping that this will put me were I need to be.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Akers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband thinks its a good reference. He showed it to some of his instructors/police officers and they agreed.
customer_reviews.author: S Hil

customer_reviews.title: Great Book
customer_reviews.text: Good book to prepare for police Officer I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: miguel garcia

customer_reviews.title: Buy this book
customer_reviews.text: Took police officer exam, some cities are different so at least take the exams if you don't read the book, study facial recognitions and grammar questions
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: if you want to be a police officer, buy this book!
customer_reviews.text: I am not yet a police officer I am just getting prepared but this book helped so much. I learned so much from this book in such little time. Not only will it improve your test scores, finding important detail, basic procedures, remembering license plates, etc. But it will teach you things you didn't think you needed. The package came safe and in new condition. The writer is from Washington so I assume that a lot of this will be on the test. Even if your not from Washington and will have a different test this book will make you a better police officer. It definitely gives you a feel for police work.
customer_reviews.author: josie

customer_reviews.title: Great price for this book
customer_reviews.text: This book prepares you for all types of law enforcement exams, not just for the police. Any type of lost prevention would benefit from using this as one of the many manuals available and the price is fantastic. Fast and great wrapped shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer57

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very informative and what is expected on the real exam
customer_reviews.author: Alma A. Delgadillo

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: It's a great book. Very informative, an effective way to prepare for the police exam.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Crismari

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Passed my exam with flying colors. The book was challenging but prepared me in a 2 week's time.
customer_reviews.author: Jared E. Springer

customer_reviews.title: Norman Hall's 2nd  Police Exam 2nd Edition
customer_reviews.text: It's a very informative book. Helps in identifying difficult study areas that need to be reviewed. Step by step solutions to those areas. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: older version of book. Book was delivered fairly quickly and in decent condition. Overall an ok pick out of the choices for the NY police exam.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I've started using the book but haven't gotten too far into it because of other schoolwork that needs to be done but so far it's been very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: bsorgi

customer_reviews.title: Book will prepare you better for tests
customer_reviews.text: I scored an 84 out of 100 taking a county police test after reading this book briefly. If you actually take more time to study it more it will prepare you better. The personality questions on the test I took were all about yourself which is no right or wrong answer but I'm guessing they didn't like mine. Overall I was ranked 226 out of around 2000 people testing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: This is the best price for this book that I have found anywhere. I will say it didn't come in like it should have, but, another was sent out to me as soon as I let them know that I still hadn't received the product. I got the second one in 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: donnie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This book has everything you need & images to get you ready!
customer_reviews.author: Maxiel Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Excelent
customer_reviews.text: OK. Thank you. I love this book. a great book for theoretical exam preparation to police. the product is very good and I am now more prepared.
customer_reviews.author: jose luis

customer_reviews.title: The book is worth every cent
customer_reviews.text: Honestly if you need seriously get high scores it's worth a read. Helped me advance far beyond measure still not finished
customer_reviews.author: demii

customer_reviews.title: One of the best
customer_reviews.text: One of the best books for the exam. I bought it used and you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sports Guy

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: This book does the job. The only part is doesn't really cover is the oral exam to follow.
customer_reviews.author: hollow man

customer_reviews.title: It really helps!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am not kidding when I say this book helped my Fiancé pass his police test with such a high score he was contacted by over 25 departments. We worked through this book before his test, a chapter at a time and it improved his previous scores by more then 10% I would HIGHLY recommended this book.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Coffman

customer_reviews.title: Great for what its worth!
customer_reviews.text: This book came in handy while I was preparing for a transit police position! I would recommend for anyone to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Lori

customer_reviews.title: Police Exam
customer_reviews.text: Excellent study guide. Son passed exam with no problem. Great for quick study before the final test. Great Job! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne W. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three different books to help me study for police exams and I found this to be the most helpful. I took an exam in Wisconsin. I think the effectiveness of a lot of these books depends on what particular exam you take. If you aren't sure, contact the police department ahead of time and ask a recruiter what categories are tested. This book goes over: memorization/recall, math, grammar/reading/spelling, filling in police report information or extracting it from a completed form. PS. I purchased a used 2005 edition as I read the updated version may have some issues so I can't speak of newer editions. I found it to be very helpful in preparing for the actual exam.
customer_reviews.author: MSRemington

customer_reviews.title: You can Pass, or you can Score
customer_reviews.text: I am very glad I purchased this book. I am a journalism major and assumed that the test will be challenging, but not too bad. After obtaining the book, I realized there is still a lot to learn, memorize, and understand about police protocol that I did not know. So This is worth every penny. Think about the passing score most people will obtain. Then think about scoring higher than everyone else.
customer_reviews.author: beau

customer_reviews.title: more of a big police dept book
customer_reviews.text: very informational. im pleased. although its prob a book for the larger dept. but it helped keep my brain fresh and also helped me brush up on some things that i have forgotten
customer_reviews.author: manno

customer_reviews.title: Good book!
customer_reviews.text: This book is much much harder than the actual police exams out there. But that is a good thing, if you can get over a 70 for a score with the built in tests I don't see why you can't get a 90 or above on the actual tests. Read it, study the types of questions and the reason for answering and you should do fine.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Awesome book
customer_reviews.text: Great book. This book shows you tons of stuff and it also gives you 3 tests to take when your done studying.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: this was exactly what I was looking for to help ...
customer_reviews.text: this was exactly what I was looking for to help my son with his first round of exams which he passed with a 94%.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Nisley

customer_reviews.title: Horrible book
customer_reviews.text: I bought this book because the OCSD had it recommended on their website. I took their test before so I knew what was going to be on the test. This book has nothing to do with OCSD or LASD test. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Bullit

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: It's okay, but it didn't help me pass the test. The reference material it uses is very old.
customer_reviews.author: Diaper Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Its a cool book and all but it really wasn't what I ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a cool book and all but it really wasn't what I wanted. but over all it was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Issac Soliz

customer_reviews.title: Not a fit
customer_reviews.text: This edition is old. I need a current edition to help me study. I should've paid attention to the date before buying
customer_reviews.author: Evie

customer_reviews.title: Just a notch better than no preparation at all
customer_reviews.text: This manual is long on verbage but short on actual practice tests. Taking practice tests is the best way to prepare for these exams. With only two very incomplete samples this book leaves too much to be desired. The review lessons are satisfactory but don't follow much of a sequence and are incomplete at best. Unfortunately, there's not much else on the market so this is the only choice, not the best choice.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen

customer_reviews.title: police exam book
customer_reviews.text: got to read a lot but that is good. If you really want to pass got to read. Work hard play hard. yeah
customer_reviews.author: Jio

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for Nypd test, but it's not so good if you're taking a Texas test.
customer_reviews.author: edwini18

customer_reviews.title: Easy reading and understandable
customer_reviews.text: Great book! A lot of obvious information that I personally didn't think of so it's good for them to point them out! Definitely enjoying this piece!
customer_reviews.author: Fermin Grande

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: So far this book covers what you need to know. If you are looking for a guide this book will help for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Lange

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Book is no good for CA post exam. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Melero

customer_reviews.title: ... helping me understand more about the testing and I love it
customer_reviews.text: This book is helping me understand more about the testing and I love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bought new it was used. Other than that it was very helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Wille
